name: Syberia
description:
This script will install "Syberia" Gog edition with support for modern computer configuration.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
DxWnd: https://sourceforge.net/projects/dxwnd/
Nircmd: https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/nircmd.html
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script will use nircmd.exe as a workaround for the black wIndow bug.
- Multilanguage: you will be able to select menus and subtitles language during install between english, french, german, spanish or italian.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

input_menu.description: Please choose language you prefer to display menus and subtitles:

content:
custom-name: Syberia - GOG
files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_24_build.rar
- nircmd: https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/nircmd-x64.zip
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- multi5: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Syberia/syberia_multi5.zip
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Syberia/clean.sh
- launcher: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Syberia/Syberia.bat
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia/Syberia.bat
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $setup --output-dir $CACHE/
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Syberia
    src: $CACHE/app
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Syberia
    src: launcher
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 100
        codepage0: 0
        commitaddress0: 0
        commitlength0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflag2: 0
        dflag3: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        filterid0: 0
        filterid2: 0
        filterid3: 0
        flag0: 673194017
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        icon2: 
        icon3: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresh2: 0
        initresh3: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initresw2: 0
        initresw3: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\Game.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        monitorid0: -1
        monitorid2: 0
        monitorid3: -1
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\Game.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        renderer0: 2
        renderer2: 3
        renderer3: 2
        scanline0: 0
        scanline2: 1
        scanline3: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Syberia
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Syberia/
    file: nircmd
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp
    file: multi5
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose language you prefer to display menus and subtitles:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - it: Italian
    - sp: Spanish
    - ge: German
    preselect: en
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG
    file: script
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
wine:
  Desktop: true
